data.title: Coming soon: ORIGIN by Dan Brown
data.meta_description: We are thrilled to announce that Doubleday will publish ORIGIN by Dan Brown on October 3, 2017! In keeping with his trademark style, Dan Brown, author of The Da Vinci Code and Inferno, interweaves codes, science, religion, history, art, and architecture into this new novel. Origin thrusts Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon into the dangerous intersection of humankind’s two most enduring questions, and the earthshaking discovery that will answer them.
data.text:
Doubleday will publish ORIGIN by Dan Brown on October 3, 2017!

In keeping with his trademark style, Dan Brown, author of The Da Vinci Code and Inferno, interweaves codes, science, religion, history, art, and architecture into this new novel. Origin thrusts Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon into the dangerous intersection of humankind’s two most enduring questions, and the earthshaking discovery that will answer them.

Dan Brown is the author of numerous #1 international bestsellers, including The Da Vinci Code, Inferno, The Lost Symbol, Angels & Demons, Deception Point, and Digital Fortress.

Origin by Dan Brown

October 3, 2017

HC • 9780385514231 • $29.95

Ebook • 9780385542692 • $14.99
